column1: Funeral services for Mrs. Poynor will be conducted 11:00 a.m. Monday at Edmaiston Mosley Funeral Home. Brother Ronnie Stinson
column2: Jr. will officiate. Burial will follow in New Salem Cemetery near Mason Hall.  Visitation will be held at Edmaiston Mosley Funeral Home from 5:00 p.m. until 8:00 p.m. Sunday.
